ADDITION AND SUBTRACTION

Since $\frac{2}{5} + \frac{4}{5} = \frac{2+4}{5}$,

$\frac{a}{c} + \frac{b}{c} = \frac{a + b}{c}$

Since $\frac{7}{9} - \frac{5}{9} = \frac{7-5}{9}$,

$\frac{a}{c} - \frac{d}{c} = \frac{a - d}{c}$

Simplify:

(a) $\frac{4}{a} + \frac{3}{b}$

(b) $\frac{5}{x} - \frac{4}{3x}$

Answer

(a) $\frac{4}{a} + \frac{3}{b}$ {LCD = $ab$}

$= \frac{4 \times b}{a \times b} + \frac{3 \times a}{b \times a} = \frac{4b}{ab} + \frac{3a}{ab} = \frac{4b + 3a}{ab}$

(b) $\frac{5}{x} - \frac{4}{3x}$ {LCD = $3x$}

$= \frac{5 \times 3}{x \times 3} - \frac{4}{3x} = \frac{15}{3x} - \frac{4}{3x} = \frac{11}{3x}$

Example 15

Write as a single fraction:

(a) $\frac{x}{6} + \frac{x - 2}{3}$

(b) $\frac{x + 1}{2} - \frac{x - 2}{3}$

Answer

(a) $\frac{x}{6} + \frac{x - 2}{3}$

$= \frac{x}{6} + \frac{2}{2}\left(\frac{x - 2}{3}\right)$

$= \frac{x + 2(x - 2)}{6}$

$= \frac{x + 2x - 4}{6}$

$= \frac{3x - 4}{6}$

(b) $\frac{x + 1}{2} - \frac{x - 2}{3}$

$= \frac{3}{3}\left(\frac{x + 1}{2}\right) - \frac{2}{2}\left(\frac{x - 2}{3}\right)$

$= \frac{3(x + 1)}{6} - \frac{2(x - 2)}{6}$

$= \frac{3(x + 1) - 2(x - 2)}{6}$

$= \frac{3x + 3 - 2x + 4}{6}$

$= \frac{x + 7}{6}$

Example 16

Write as a single fraction:

(a) $\frac{1}{x} + \frac{2}{x - 1}$

(b) $\frac{2}{x - 1} - \frac{3}{x + 1}$

Answer

(a) $\frac{1}{x} + \frac{2}{x - 1}$

$= \frac{1}{x}\left(\frac{x - 1}{x - 1}\right) + \left(\frac{2}{x - 1}\right)\frac{x}{x}$ {LCD = $x(x - 1)$}

$= \frac{1(x - 1) + 2x}{x(x - 1)}$

$= \frac{x - 1 + 2x}{x(x - 1)}$

$= \frac{3x - 1}{x(x - 1)}$

(b) $\frac{2}{x - 1} - \frac{3}{x + 1}$

$= \left(\frac{2}{x - 1}\right)\left(\frac{x + 1}{x + 1}\right) - \left(\frac{3}{x + 1}\right)\left(\frac{x - 1}{x - 1}\right)$ {LCD = $(x - 1)(x + 1)$}

$= \frac{2(x + 1) - 3(x - 1)}{(x - 1)(x + 1)}$

$= \frac{2x + 2 - 3x + 3}{(x - 1)(x + 1)}$

$= \frac{-x + 5}{(x - 1)(x + 1)}$ or $\frac{5 - x}{(x - 1)(x + 1)}$
